member.name: T:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests
member.summary: Tests for PieceTree buffer API methods: getLineCharCode, buffer equality. These tests mirror TS pieceTreeTextBuffer.test.ts lines 1750-1888.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.GetLineCharCode_Issue45735_SingleChunk
member.summary: Test getLineCharCode - issue #45735 TS: test('getLineCharCode - issue #45735', () => {...}) Source: pieceTreeTextBuffer.test.ts lines 1786-1800

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.GetLineCharCode_Issue47733_MultiChunkWithEmptyFirst
member.summary: Test getLineCharCode - issue #47733 TS: test('getLineCharCode - issue #47733', () => {...}) Source: pieceTreeTextBuffer.test.ts lines 1804-1818 Tests multi-chunk buffer where first chunk is empty.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.GetLineCharCode_OutOfBounds_ReturnsZero
member.summary: Test getLineCharCode returns 0 for out-of-bounds access. Note: C# implementation clamps to valid range, so we test boundary behavior.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.GetLineCharCode_CrlfLineEndings
member.summary: Test getLineCharCode with CRLF line endings.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.GetLineCharCode_CrlfAcrossChunks
member.summary: Ensure CR and LF split across chunk boundaries still return correct char codes. Mirrors TS regression tests for CRLF straddling pieces.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.Buffer_Equal_IdenticalContent
member.summary: Test buffer equality for identical content.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.Buffer_Equal_DifferentContent
member.summary: Test buffer equality for different content.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.Buffer_Equal_AfterEditsToSameContent
member.summary: Test buffer equality after edits resulting in same content.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.Buffer_Equal_EmptyBuffers
member.summary: Test buffer equality for empty buffers.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.Buffer_Equal_SameContentAcrossChunkBoundaries
member.summary: Equal buffers should compare true even when chunk layouts differ. Mirrors TS buffer api 'equal' test.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.Buffer_Equal_ChunkPermutations
member.summary: Equal buffers remain equal with more chunk permutations. Mirrors TS buffer api 'equal with more chunks'.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.Buffer_Equal_EmptyVsNonEmpty
member.summary: Equality should handle empty buffers in both operands.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.Buffer_Equal_DifferentBom
member.summary: Buffers with different BOM values should not compare equal even if text matches. Mirrors TS PieceTreeTextBuffer.equals implementation.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.Buffer_Equal_DifferentEolSequences
member.summary: Buffers with different preferred EOL sequences should not compare equal.

member.name: M:PieceTree.TextBuffer.Tests.PieceTreeBufferApiTests.GetCharCode_BasicAscii
member.summary: Test GetCharCode for basic ASCII content.
